revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to enclose herewith a letter from John W. Noble, Esq. U. S. Attorney for the Eastern District of Missouri, asking authority to enter a nolle prosequi in certain indictments against Morris B. Brown; also a letter from Hon. John M. Palmer on the same subject.
These papers are referred to you for your opinion on the propriety of the action recommended—and you are requested to return them with your opinion.
body.note: case of Morris B. Brown, Missouri.
